evidence.claim: Trustpeople uses AWS and GCP for their cloud infrastructure.
The integration patterns include RESTful APIs and message queues for real-time data processing.
Trustpeople handles health data under HIPAA guidelines employing FHIR and HL7 standards.
Mention of Snowflake as a data platform for health-tech analytics.
Use of Apache Kafka for data streaming solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of involvement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse operations.
